title: Complete Me
description: Do you ever know someone completely…Three men—confident, admired, intensely cherished, and respected.The women who love them, different in so many ways—a mother, an eccentric, and a wife—all deeply connected by the men they adore. They think they’re complete.The truth is harder.The past reveals all, secrets unveiled, and a wedding for all ages sees everyone feeling solace. This generational story is filled with heartache, but every story needs a happy ending to complete us… From International Bestselling Author K E Osborn comes, Complete Me Book Four in the Trust Me Series (previously published in 2014). This series has been re-edited with new content and a new cover.
author: K.E. Osborn
